metadata.title: Choosing the right algorithm with hints from complexity theory

references.content:
[1] S. Wang, W. Zheng, B. Doerr, Choosing the right algorithm with hints from complexity theory, in: International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence, IJCAI 2021, ijcai.org, 2021, pp. 1697-1703.
